notFound.seoDescription: The page you are looking for does not exist.
notFound.headline: Lost off the edge of the map

notFound.description: The hex you are looking for has been removed or never existed.

maintenance.seoDescription: We are currently upgrading our systems. Please check back soon.
maintenance.title: System Maintenance
maintenance.subtitle: The hall is under repair
maintenance.description: We are performing essential upgrades to ensure a more stable magic connection. Please take a short break and return later.
maintenance.note: Our scribes are rewriting the scrolls. Please check back soon.

summonerwars.title: Summoner Wars
summonerwars.description: Summoner Wars is a fast-paced, tactical 2-player game. Players take on the role of Summoners, leading their faction to conquer the war-torn world of Itharia through the power of mysterious Summoning Stones.
